meanings.sent1: She kept mislabeling the boxes in the storage room.
meanings.sent2: The company was fined for mislabeling their products.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf was mislabeling all the presents in Santa's workshop.
meanings.sent4: Her constant mislabeling of ingredients was like playing a dangerous game of culinary roulette.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of mislabeling can be costly and harmful.

meanings.definition: The act of incorrectly labeling something.
meanings.sent1: The mislabeling of the packages caused confusion among the staff.
meanings.sent2: There was a lawsuit due to the mislabeling of the medication bottles.
meanings.sent3: The mislabeling on the sign made everyone laugh as they entered the store.
meanings.sent4: The mislabeling of emotions can lead to misunderstandings in relationships.
meanings.sent5: Proper training can help prevent mislabeling in the workplace.
